meta.content: Welcome to the Forest Park School District. Forest Park Elementary, Middle, and High School is located in one building in Crystal Falls, Michigan.

In 2016, Forest Park School District was recognized as a Notably
Successful School District in Michigan Education Finance Study. Read more…
In 2014, Forest Park High School was named by US News and World Report as one of the top
High Schools in the United States earning a top 9% ranking and earning A bronze medal.

students, parents, and community to
pursue their potential by creating
opportunities to acquire essential skills
through exploratory avenues of
intellectual, creative, and social growth.

div.h2: Dickinson-Iron Great Start Readiness Program Sub-Recipients
div.span: WE NEED SUBSTITUTE TEACHERS!!
EDUStaff provides quality educational staffing and Human Resource services for schools through extensive
recruiting for classroom employees, holding face-to-face workshops to provide a better classroom
experience, and offering unbeatable customer service. Let our skilled and experienced team serve you!
Please apply on the website: https://apply.edustaff.org. The Employee Services number 877-974-6338 is
available Monday through Friday from 7:30am – 4:30pm.

span.span: at Forest Park Schools is dedicated to the enhancement

div.span: and enrichment of educational opportunities for the young people of Forest Park. This includes providing
scholarships for those about to graduate. Check out the new website by clicking here.
Through a Request for Pricing Bid Process and receiving bids from 4 firms, Automated Comfort Controls out
of Appleton, WI is awarded the Pneumatic to Direct Digital Controls conversion project. Although the final
Scope of Work included more than the original budgeted work, the final bid amount of $182,867 still came in
under the budgeted amount of $185,000. Coupled with the reserved incentives of approximately $15,000
from DTE Gas and Efficiency United, the project shall be under the original budget amount and shall also
reduce the energy consumption of the facility.

img.alt: Click here for directions to 801 Forest Parkway Crystal Falls, Michigan 49920

div.span: WE NEED SUBSTITUTE TEACHERS!!
EDUStaff provides quality educational staffing and
Human Resource services for schools through
extensive recruiting for classroom employees, holding
face-to-face workshops to provide a better classroom
experience, and offering unbeatable customer service.
Let our skilled and experienced team serve you!
Please apply on the website:
https://apply.edustaff.org. The Employee Services
number 877-974-6338 is available Monday through
Friday from 7:30am – 4:30pm.
Forest Park Schools is dedicated to the enhancement
and enrichment of educational opportunities for the
young people of Forest Park. This includes providing
scholarships for those about to graduate. Check out
the new website by clicking here.
Through a Request for Pricing Bid Process and
receiving bids from 4 firms, Automated Comfort
Controls out of Appleton, WI is awarded the
Pneumatic to Direct Digital Controls conversion
project. Although the final Scope of Work included
more than the original budgeted work, the final bid
amount of $182,867 still came in under the budgeted
amount of $185,000. Coupled with the reserved
incentives of approximately $15,000 from DTE Gas
and Efficiency United, the project shall be under the
original budget amount and shall also reduce the
energy consumption of the facility.

to provide a better classroom experience, and offering unbeatable customer service. Let our skilled and experienced team serve you!

Through a Request for Pricing Bid Process and receiving bids from 4 firms, Automated Comfort Controls out of Appleton, WI is awarded the Pneumatic to Direct Digital Controls
